mapper.select: SELECT RNUM , NO , POST_NO , MEMBER_NO , USERID , CONTENT , DELETED , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , NO , POST_NO , MEMBER_NO , (SELECT LOGINID FROM MEMBER WHERE NO = MEMBER_NO) AS USERID , CONTENT , DELETED , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_DATE FROM POST_REPLY WHERE POST_NO = #{no}) WHERE RNUM < 4
